attributes.action: Award Dean Ashton an MBE for services to Humanity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For over 22 years Dean Ashton has given the world countless hours of joy through his sporting prowess, humour, wit, love, affection and doinking mingers and fitties alike. He has put smiles where there were only frowns, moistness where there was only dryness, amazement where there was only normality and sporting excellence where there was only dourness

He is truly a beacon of light in a world of darkness, and has raised money for countless bar owners and late night takeaway houses around the country. He has saved many woman from the arms of lesser men.

Do the right thing and we may forgive Iraq!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
